text: Samantha Joy Mostyn (born 13 September 1965) is an Australian businesswoman and climate change and gender equity activist who is the Governor-General of Australia since 2024. Mostyn was president at Chief Executive Women in 2021â€“22. On 3 April 2024, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese announced that King Charles III had approved the appointment of Mostyn as the next Governor- General of Australia. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Australian activists Category:Australian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Canberra Category:Australian feminists Category:Governors-general of Australia
title: Sam Mostyn
